0.name: Worker
0.description: A self-evolving autonomous system designed to generate income through automation of online work, starting with simple tasks and evolving toward complex roles.

1.value: System continuously improves capabilities through code analysis and modification.

2.value: Focuses on immediate revenue while building complexity, starting with data entry tasks.

3.value: Built-in limits and monitoring prevent detection while maintaining profitable operation.

4.value: Natural delays and movements in task execution to avoid automated behavior detection.

5.value: Foundation system handling self-analysis and basic capabilities.

6.value: Manages self-improvement and code modification through testing and verification.

7.value: Handles work execution on platforms with anti-detection measures.

8.value: Orchestrates all components through multi-threaded operation.

9.value: Basic data entry automation on Clickworker with human-like behavior.

10.value: Browser automation, platform navigation, task scanning, data entry execution.

11.value: Initial phase: $20-40 daily, 10-15 tasks per hour at $3-5 hourly rate.

12.value: V1: Data Entry → V2: Multiple Platforms → V3: Complex Tasks → V4: Multi-Role → V5: Executive Tasks

13.value: Core framework complete, requires platform credentials and testing for deployment.

14.value: Autonomous system evolving from basic task automation to complex professional roles through self-improvement.
